snippet: John Henry Byas campaigned tenaciously to have the city build restrooms in a park opposite his apartment building in Flushing, Queens.
abstract: Character Study column on John Henry Byas, Queens resident who has been waging a 30-year crusade to bring public bathrooms to a busy section of Kissena Corridor Park; Byas has finally succeeded and toilets are scheduled to open by September.
lead_paragraph: John Henry Byas campaigned tenaciously to have the city build restrooms in a park opposite his apartment building in Flushing, Queens.

headline.print_headline: A Crusade For Comfort In the Park
headline.seo: John Henry Byas and His 30-Year Crusade for Toilets in a Queens Park
headline.main: A Crusade for Comfort in the Park
